about_the_game:
Cats! Knives! Two of our timeline's greatest inventions are now paired together, but now the cats are using them to battle against each other!

In this 2D multiplayer action game, take control of these cats using the various sharp weaponry at your disposal and your cat-born agility to traverse the wide range of stages.

Features

  • 2 to 4 player local multiplayer OR online through Steam Remote Play!
  • Several different weapons to stab and throw with!
  • 15 different levels to play on!
  • 30+ different hats to equip your cat with!
  • A meow button!
  • Cats!
  • Knives!

Credits

  • Design: Sebastian Schindler, Demmy Manguso
  • Programming: Evan McGrath, Jonah Gasson, Sebastian Schindler
  • Art: Chris West, Jake Currier, Bella Moses, Daniel Dennis
  • Audio: Jake Currier, Matthew Hein, Sebastian Schindler

In this 2D multiplayer action game, take control of these cats using the various sharp weaponry at your disposal and your cat-born agility to traverse the wide range of stages.

name: Stabby Cats

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6200U
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Fighting your fellow kitties with your incredible agility and arsenal of sharp weaponry in this 2D action game! Toss knives, climb around mansions, and stab your friends to see who will be rewarded the coveted golden yarn!
